net.explorviz.security.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.security.services.UserService

  • @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    Offers CRUD operations on user objects, backed by a MongoDB instance as persistence layer. Each user has the following fields:
    • id: the unique id of the user
    • username: name of the user, unique
    • password: hashed password
    • roles: list of role that are assigned to the user

      • deleteEntityById

        public void deleteEntityById(java.lang.String id)
                      throws UserCrudException
        Tries to delete the user with the given id. If such a user does not exists, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the user to delete
        Throws:
        UserCrudException - if the id belongs to the a user with the admin role and there are no other admin users. This prevents the deletion of the last admin.

      • findEntityByFieldValue

        public java.util.Optional<net.explorviz.shared.security.model.User> findEntityByFieldValue(java.lang.String field,
                                                                                           java.lang.Object value)
        Find the first user that satisfies the condition specified in the parameters.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to compare
        value - the value to compare with
        Returns:
        the first user which's field contains the given value.
